title: Les Traîtres : Seront-ils démasqués ?
overview: It is in a castle that 14 personalities will participate in a game of lies, manipulation and betrayal where all shots will be allowed. Among the players, 3 will be designated as "traitors", the others will be "loyal". Day and night, the "traitors" will have to lie about their true identity, develop strategies to deceive the "loyal" and ensure their place in the game. And above all avoid eliminations to arrive last and win the game!
